page.title: 02The Survey
page.content: My name is Nick Warhurst and I come from Hillbourne Middle School.I am in the fourth year and we are taking part in the Domesday project.On the trips we were broken into eight groups.Two groups went on a trip at a time and each group had two trips.We went in the mini-bus.Most of the groups saw a lot of heathland and residential areas.Our group did a survey on Corfe Mullen and from the reservoir we could look over Poole Harbour,our area,and most of Poole.After we had been on two trips we had to make a map with different coloured sticky paper using a key.
